page.title: 07Computers
page.content: At our school we have a computer. We have Maths and English programs for education. The language we use is called Basic. Most of the programs we have use no graphics. The computer we have is a BBC model B with disc drive, printer and monitor.The monitor is like a television but you cannot watch television programmes on it. All the Domesday project, land use and amenities will go on to disc at our school. It will be sent to England, possibly through the telephone network. When all the information is collected together it will be put onto a video disc with grooves like a record. Each disc can store millions of pages of data and be printed out.
